scripts.start: npm run build && cd public && npx concurrently "npx babel ../src --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts' --config-file ../.babelrc --watch" "npx live-server"
scripts.build: npx snowpack install --dest 'public/web_modules/' --include 'src/**/*.ts' --clean && cd public && npx babel ../src --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts' --config-file ../.babelrc
